original_text: A sword is upon their horses, and upon their chariots, and upon all the mingled people that are in the midst of her; and they shall become as women: a sword is upon her treasures; and they shall be robbed.
korean_text: 칼이 그들의 말들과 병거들과 그들 중에 있는 여러 민족의 위에 떨어지리니 그들이 여인들 같이 될 것이며 칼이 보물 위에 떨어지리니 그것이 약탈되리라

sentences.original_text: A sword is upon their horses
and upon all the mingled people
that are in the midst of her
and they shall become as women
a sword is upon her treasures
